exceptions.exn: The LHS of H1 (valid (dstate (getStatelet i k))) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet n : nid k : Label x : heap y : soup H : k \\in dom i H0 : valid i H1 : valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) Unable to unify "x" with "match find n (dstate (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k)) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: UMC.sort (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)
n: nid
k: Equality.sort Label
x: heap
y: soup

Goal:
k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
Notation heap := Heap.heap
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
nid = nat : Set
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
EmptyProt = fun i : Label => Protocol i snd_uniq0 rcv_uniq0 : Label -> protocol
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
consumeUn : forall (s' : soup) (i : mid) (mm : msg TaggedMessage) (j : mid), valid (s' \+ i \\-> mm) -> consume_msg (s' \+ i \\-> mm) j = (if i == j then s' \+ i \\-> mark_msg mm else consume_msg s' j \+ i \\-> mm)
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
FinMap : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (seq_of : seq (K * V)), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of] -> finMap K V
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
validUUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f1 f2 : U), k \in dom f1 -> valid (upd k v f1 \+ f2) = valid (f1 \+ f2)
validUnU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f1 f2 : U), k \in dom f2 -> valid (f1 \+ upd k v f2) = valid (f1 \+ f2)
supp = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s : finMap K V) => [seq key i | i <- seq_of s] : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), finMap K V -> seq K Arguments supp {K} {V}%type_scope
Variant validUn_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) : bool -> Type := valid_false1 : ~~ valid f1 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false2 : ~~ valid f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false3 : forall k : K, k \in dom f1 -> k \in dom f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_true : valid f1 -> valid f2 ->...-> validUn_spec f1 f2 true Arguments validUn_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments valid_false1 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1] Arguments valid_false2 [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ [f2] Arguments valid_false3 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2 k] Arguments valid_true [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2] _ _ _%function_scope
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
keys_last_mono : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) (k : K), path oleq k (dom f1) -> path oleq k (dom f2) -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \in dom f2) -> oleq (last k (dom f1)) (last k (dom f2))
domU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), dom (upd k v f) =i [pred x | cond U k & if x == k then valid f else x \in dom f]
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
updUnL : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f1 f2 : U), upd k v (f1 \+ f2) = (if k \in dom f1 then upd k v f1 \+ f2 else f1 \+ upd k v f2)
valid_false3 : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) (k : K), k \in dom f1 -> k \in dom f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
validU : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (upd k v f) = cond U k && valid f
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = pts k v \+ free k f
max_key_last : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (x : [ordType of nat]), x \in dom f -> {in dom f, forall y : nat, y <= x} -> last_key f = x
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
sorted_max_key_last : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> (forall z : A, z \in s -> oleq z x) -> last y s = x
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
dom_cond : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> cond U k
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> axioms.dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
validR : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid y
sorted_last_key_max : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> oleq x (last y s)

```coq
intros.
intros H1 H2 H3.
unfold getLocal.
rewrite H1.
rewrite <- H3.
rewrite H2.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. unfold getLocal. rewrite H1. rewrite <- H3. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
